# hasChanges

**Instance Property**

Returns whether this object or any of the objects it contains has uncommitted changes.

## Declaration

```swift
var hasChanges: Bool { get }
```

## Return Value

Returns [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if there are uncommitted changes; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Saving and Restoring State

- **isNew**: A Boolean value that indicates whether this object has ever been saved.
- **refresh()**: Merges changes to this object with the latest saved values.
- **reset()**: Returns this object to its saved state.
- **rollback()**: Rolls back the property values of this object to its original state when it was first fetched.
